Class OceanusPrice

java.lang.Object

net.sourceforge.joceanus.oceanus.decimal.OceanusPrice
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<OceanusDecimal>
public class OceanusPrice extends OceanusMoney
Represents a Price object.
